channel.title: Steam tag in forums
channel.description:
ok this might be the wrong section for this. The steam tag that you input in the forum posts for members. Those that have set it up anyway. Is there a way I can get a hold of that code and implement it into my own site? or at least a link to some white pages where I can code one for my own forum? any help would be appreciated.
I love the steam forum tag and want to give my HL clan the same feature.

item.title: Steam tag in forums
item.dc:creator: jackDaniels
item.description:
and thanks Fergus! much appreciated.

Read full topic

item.title: Steam tag in forums
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
Maybe then you’ll learn that you have to input your Steam ID number, not your steam name.

Read full topic

item.title: Steam tag in forums
item.dc:creator: FERGUS
item.description:
I think it’s this one: https://code.google.com/p/steamprofile/source/browse/trunk/ajax/steamprofile.js?r=87.

Seriously, wasn’t that hard to view the source code for this site, find this line “steamprofile/steamprofile.js” and google it.

Read full topic
